titles: At a Common Councel holden in the Guildhall London, on Tuesday the 20th of December, 1659.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660.
publisher: Printed by James Flesher Printer to the honourable City of London,
notes: A declaration by the Common Council, vindicating the Lord Mayor and others from "certain scandalous aspersions, contained in a pamphlet entitled, The final protest and sense of the city" -- Thomason catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Alleyne, Thomas, --  Sir, fl. 1660 --  Early works to 1800.
Final protest and sense of the city --  Early works to 1800.
London (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
